concepts.name: Machine Learning
concepts.description: A subset of artificial intelligence that enables computers to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed

concepts.name: Neural Networks
concepts.description: Computing systems inspired by biological neural networks, consisting of interconnected nodes that process information

concepts.name: Deep Learning
concepts.description: A subset of machine learning using neural networks with multiple layers to model complex patterns in data

concepts.name: Supervised Learning
concepts.description: Machine learning approach where algorithms learn from labeled training data to make predictions

concepts.name: Unsupervised Learning
concepts.description: Machine learning approach that finds patterns in data without labeled examples

concepts.name: Reinforcement Learning
concepts.description: Learning approach where agents learn optimal actions through trial and error with rewards and penalties

concepts.name: Algorithms
concepts.description: Step-by-step procedures or formulas for solving computational problems

concepts.name: Data
concepts.description: Raw facts, figures, and information that can be processed by computers to extract insights

concepts.name: Artificial Intelligence
concepts.description: The simulation of human intelligence in machines programmed to think and learn

metadata.title: AI and Machine Learning Concepts
metadata.description: A mental model showing relationships between key concepts in artificial intelligence and machine learning
